data.title: Duke University [2024 Rankings by topic]
data.meta_description: Duke University ranked 28th in the United States and 34th in the World 2024 overall rankings, while got 9th place for Intellectual Property and Patent Law and top 100 for 153 other topics. See all 245 academic rankings both national and global.
data.meta_site_name: EduRank.org - Discover university rankings by location
data.text:
Duke University: Rankings

Updated: February 29, 2024

EduRank

Duke University ranked 28th in the United States, 34th in the global 2024 rating, and scored in the TOP 100 across 154 research topics. Duke University ranking is based on 3 factors: research output (EduRank's index has 186,290 academic publications and 7,048,348 citations attributed to the university), non-academic reputation, and the impact of 788 notable alumni.

Ranking Category #34 of 14,131 In the World #30 of 2,597 In North America #28 of 2,496 In the United States #2 of 65 In North Carolina #1 of 2 In Durham #9 of 1,054 For Intellectual Property and Patent Law #16 of 1,621 For Ophthalmology #17 of 1,004 For Sonography and Ultrasound #55 of 7,738 For Alumni Impact #23 of 14,131 For Non-academic Prominence Top100 For 151 other topics
